README.METHOD_LINE1: The method designates which repair method is used.
README.METHOD_LINE2: All the method modules should be placed under 'repair' folder.
README.DATASET_LINE1: The dataset designates which dataset is used
README.DATASET_LINE2: All the dataset modules should be placed under 'dataset' folder
README.MODEL_LINE1: The model designates which model is used
README.MODEL_LINE2: All the model modules should be placed under 'model' folder
README.CUSTOM_OBJECTS_LINE1: The custom_objects designates custom layer classes required to load model in this framework
README.VALUES_LINE1: The values are actual module names like 'package_name.class_name'
README.VALUES_LINE2: e.g. 'arachne.arachne.Arachne' means importing 'repair.arachne.arachne' and generating Arachne's instance
README.VALUES_LINE3: parent pkg phrase like 'dataset' or 'repair' is concatinated automatically
